name: Wailord
description: The Float Whale Pokémon. Wailord is the largest of all identified Pokémon up to now. This giant Pokémon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to burning.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.
